altername_name: Iblard: The City of Hatching Laputa
イバラード ～ラピュタの孵る街～
name: Iblard: Laputa no Kaeru Machi
overview: Ibarado Rapture no Kaeru Machi is a first-person perspective action adventure that tells the story of a boy that when he was reading a fantasy book about a world called Ibarado he saw some strange people (a girl with 2 strange creatures, one of them is a mole) in the street, and they take him to the fantasy world called Ibarado where the people who lived there told him that their world (that is a collection of some floating islands) is vanishing and that he got to find some objects to save it and after success in all the game levels he will come back to his own world. In each level the player can jump, use items such as brooms and boomerang, the goal basically is to collect items that are needed to clear the stage.
